Ludwigsburg - ALBA Berlin 74:75

ALBA Berlin celebrated easyCredit BBL title. They swept Ludwigsburg in the Finals earning a narrow 75:74 win in the return leg tonight. Niels Giffey (200-G/F-91, college: UConn, agency: BeoBasket) and Martin Hermannsson (190-G-94, college: LIU Brooklyn) provided 14 points each to pace the champions. The victory marked the first BBL success for ALBA in the last 12 years.

ALBA started strong going on a 21:11 run in the first period. Ludwigsburg managed to stop the rot as they dropped 24 points in the second quarter. But ALBA looked confident. They answered with a 25:19 run in the third term to stay in charge. Ludwigsburg finished the game on a furious 20:8 run but came up short of win at the end. Marcus Eriksson (201-SF-93) netted 13 points for ALBA. Thomas Wimbush (201-F-93, college: Fairmont St.) answered with 19 points and 8 rebounds for Ludwigsburg. Marcos Knight (188-G-89, college: MTSU, agency: BeoBasket) was named the MVP after the game though missing today's game with an injury.

Tags : NIELS GIFFEY, ALBA BERLIN, GERMAN BASKETBALL
